Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that civil servants and pensioners in Myanmar will no longer receive payments, as the video has been manipulated and does not relate to the payments to civil servants and pensioners.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a manipulated video that has been doctored using three separate clips.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is accurate and represents an official announcement, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists, which is that the video is part of a disinformation campaign by the anti-government protest group, the Civil Disobedience Movement (CDM), to further their cause.
